title: Mexico sets April Maya oil price for international buyers
text: March 7, 2018 / 5:30 PM / Updated 2 hours ago Mexico sets April Maya oil price for international buyers Reuters Staff 3 Min Read MEXICO CITY, March 7 (Reuters) - Mexican state-owned oil company Pemex revised its April term pricing formulas for crude oil shipped to customers in the Americas, Europe and the Far East, the company said on Wednesday. The following table lists the adjustments to price constants in the Americas, the U.S. West Coast, Europe and the Far East: DESTINATION MARCH CONSTANT APRIL CONSTANT - AMERICAS Maya crude -2.30 -3.30 Isthmus crude +1.90 +1.90 Olmeca crude +3.50 +3.25 U.S WEST COAST Maya crude -3.40 -3.40 Isthmus crude +1.20 +1.90 EUROPE Maya crude -5.65 -6.60 Isthmus crude -1.40 -2.40 Olmeca crude -1.50 -1.50 FAR EAST Maya crude -8.85 -9.20 Isthmus crude -1.20 -1.75
